name: RGBULLET
description:
WARNING THIS GAME MAY TRIGGER PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY

This Game Was made With Unity for the    BULLET HELL JAM        

Move the Player With (  W, A, S, D )

Get Invincible for a short time with (  Left Shift )

Shoot with ( Left Mouse Button)

Aim with (Mouse Cursor)

If you want the BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM overkill then download the Project File.
